name: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
desc: The values that can be returned in a change dictionary.

items.name: static var new: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
items.desc: Indicates that the change dictionary should provide the new attribute value, if applicable.

items.name: static var old: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
items.desc: Indicates that the change dictionary should contain the old attribute value, if applicable.

items.name: static var initial: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
items.desc: If specified, a notification should be sent to the observer immediately, before the observer registration method even returns.

items.name: static var prior: NSKeyValueObservingOptions
items.desc: Whether separate notifications should be sent to the observer before and after each change, instead of a single notification after the change.
